name: Corrupted (itch) (MrIndieWolf)
description:
In Corrupted, your main goal is to make it to the next level- alive. You play as an attack drone sent to take out the rest of the strange, slimy creatures which attacked your space shuttle. However, when things go south, you have no choice but to evacuate before the slimes corrupt everything.

Use W, A, S, and D or the arrow keys to move
Shoot with the Spacebar
You can restart the current level by pressing R
Press Escape to return to the menu
Everytime you are hit by a slime, you will lose all movement for 2 seconds, but you can still shoot. If you lose all of your health in a level or the timer runs out, you lose.

Have fun!

Made by MrIndieWolf for the GMTK Game Jam 2020
